classmethod add_column(column_name: str, data_type: str, constraints: List[str | Rules] | None) → None[source]

Add a column to the table using the ORMManager instance.

Parameters:

  • column_name (str) – The name of the column to add.

  • data_type (str) – The data type of the column.

  • constraints (Optional[List[Union[str, Rules]]]) – Optional constraints for the column.

Raises:

ORMMException – If ORMManager instance is not set.

DbUnify.SQLite3.sync.ORM.ORMManager module

class DbUnify.SQLite3.sync.ORM.ORMManager.ORMManager(db_name: str, cache_ttl: int = 60)[source]

Bases: Manager

ORMManager Class

The ORMManager class provides methods for managing database schema and interactions using ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) principles. It extends the Manager class and includes functionalities for mapping models, applying migrations, and handling database resources.

cache

An instance of the Cache class for caching query results.

Type:

Cache
